name: Car Chase (avegio)
description:
LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS (once you start moving).
Oh no, an out-of-control driverless hovercar is racing round Raycaster city - it's about to drive right past you! You need to bump it five times to disable it. 
Probably best in fullscreen.
Tips: 
- you can drive on the sidewalk/pavement.
- you can't catch the car in a straight line, so try to intercept it.

You can do this on Mobile as long as you have a BlueTooth or Wired keyboard that you can connect it to.
